Articles.Content:
A game based on the Family Guy meme "pepperidge farm remembers".

-Do you remember when Skillful was the mod of choice for adding guns to KSP? Pepperidge Farm remembers.

-Remember when everyone was so hyped about the rover wheels coming in the 0.19 update? Pepperidge Farm remembers.

-Remember when my everybody was excited about other supposedly revolutionary future games like Star Citizen and No Man's Sky? Pepperidge Farm remembers.

Remember when reentry was harmless? Peppered Ridge Farm remembers!

Remember when destructible buildings became a thing? Peppered Ridge Farm remembers!
Remember when cockpits looked futuristic? Pepperidge Farm remembers.
Remember when the 0.625m SAS wheel was a 1.25m part? Pepperidge Farm Remembers.

3 hours ago, Ultimate Steve said:

Remember when the 0.625m SAS wheel was a 1.25m part? Pepperidge Farm Remembers.

Remember when they did different things? PFR

Edited February 18, 2018 by 0111narwhalz
